allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix iOS scheme name and configure Fastlane for CI/CD

- Update iOS scheme from ''maya'' to ''Maya'' in build.yml and Fastfile
- Add debugging step to list available schemes in build workflow
- Fix .gitignore to properly include fastlane configs while ignoring native code
- Remove native Android files from git tracking \(will be generated by expo prebuild in CI\)
- Keep only android/fastlane/ and ios/fastlane/ configuration folders

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Fastlane working directory in all GitHub Actions workflows

- Add working-directory parameter to all Fastlane steps instead of cd commands
- This ensures Fastlane runs from the correct directory \(android/ or ios/\)
- Fix the "Could not find fastlane in current directory" error
- Add debug step in build.yml to verify directory structure
- Apply fix to build.yml, deploy.yml, submit.yml, and setup-match.yml

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix iOS build to use iphoneos SDK instead of simulator

- Change build target from iphonesimulator to iphoneos with generic/platform=iOS
- This avoids simulator runtime mismatch errors with expo-dev-launcher
- Add Xcode derived data cleanup step before build
- Build for generic iOS device which doesn''t require simulator runtimes

This fixes: "No simulator runtime version available" error

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Remove expo-dev-client from CI/CD builds to fix simulator runtime error

- expo-dev-client is only needed for development, not production builds
- Uninstall it before running expo prebuild in all workflows
- This prevents asset catalog compilation errors with simulator runtimes
- Fixes: "No simulator runtime version available" error in expo-dev-launcher

Applied to: build.yml, deploy.yml, submit.yml, setup-match.yml

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Backup and restore Fastlane configs before/after expo prebuild --clean

- expo prebuild --clean deletes the entire android/ folder including fastlane/
- Solution: backup fastlane/ before prebuild, restore it after
- This ensures Fastlane configuration is available for build steps
- Fixes: "Could not find fastlane in current directory" error

Applied to: build.yml, deploy.yml, submit.yml

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Android Fastfile paths for working-directory execution

- Change project_dir from "android/" to "./" since Fastlane runs from android/
- Fix AAB paths to be relative to android/ directory
- Resolves: "Couldn't find gradlew at path '.../android/android/gradlew '"

The workflow uses working-directory: android, so paths must be relative to that.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
